data.actual_result: A message is posted with a link to the first webpage
data.expected_result: A message is posted with a link to the new webpage
data.short_description: Sharing Link from In-App Browser Only Shares Link to First Page
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on a message with a link to open the in-app browser (mine was a youtube video, but seems to happen in general) - Tap on a link in that webpage, such as a recommended video on youtube - Tap the share button at the bottom of the browser, and post the link
